item.title: GSOC 2015 Introduction
item.description:
Hello Everyone!

I’m Arian, a Computer Science student. I’m one of the students accepted in the Google Summer of Code program, and my project will be for OpenStreetMap! I’ll be working on developing an integrated Learning Platform for the Overpass API.

As it is right now, learning resources for the Overpass API is quite limited, and this project aims to fix that. Here’s a short list of features to be implemented:

  • Learning platform
